name: Ethereum JSON RPC Specification
description: It contains the documentation, tooling, libraries and scripts to automate producing artifacts for consuming the JSON-RPC API (interactive docs, clients, etc).

name: ESerialize
description: A module and playground to provide easy functions to serialize and deserialize data.

name: Expedition
description: A block explorer for the Ethereum Stack.

name: Jade
description: Jade is an opinionated JSON-RPC service manager, that provides daemonization, installation, and discovery for JSON-RPC based services.

name: Signatory
description: Signatory is an offline transaction and message signer.

name: Sig.tools
description: sig.tools is a tool to enable the offline distributed generation and management of cryptographic accounts.

name: RPCFlow
description: A standard way to define JSON-RPC flows.

name: core-geth
description: A highly configurable Go implementation of the Ethereum protocol.
